message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $120.  I think you'll find it's a great deal for a product of this quality.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only able to pay up to $95 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I appreciate you recognizing the value. I could come down to $110, but I can't go any lower than that.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I am willing to pay $100 for the product, which is the maximum I am comfortable with. Thank you for understanding.
